name: Gerhard Helscher
description: I am essentially humble, kind, focus, caring, loving, honest man. I enjoy a lively atmosphere. I appreciate sincerity. I love to play piano, and drum. What i am looking for in a partner, I am not in need for a physical perfection. I am seeking a positive motivated honest, caring and respectful woman. Should have good morals and values as I do. I don’t seek perfection that only leaves nothing better to look forward to. Pleasant conversation, laughs, mutual attraction and chemistry are always nice to have. A woman is sincere, humble is what a call a queen.
